title: LinkedIn Profile Posts Scraper
description: Scrapes posts from LinkedIn profiles using Puppeteer, with robust proxy handling.

profileUrls.title: Profile URLs
profileUrls.description: List of LinkedIn profile URLs to scrape.

maxPosts.title: Maximum Posts per Profile
maxPosts.description: Maximum number of posts to scrape per profile (0 for unlimited).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Select proxy type. Using Apify Residential or Datacenter proxies is STRONGLY RECOMMENDED to avoid LinkedIn blocks. Ensure your Apify account has access to the selected proxy type.

includeComments.title: Include Comments
includeComments.description: Whether to scrape comments for each post (Feature not fully implemented yet).

maxCommentsPerPost.title: Maximum Comments per Post
maxCommentsPerPost.description: Maximum number of comments to scrape per post (if comments are enabled).

dateFrom.title: Start Date (Optional)
dateFrom.description: Only include posts from this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

dateTo.title: End Date (Optional)
dateTo.description: Only include posts until this date (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

includeMedia.title: Include Media URLs (Optional)
includeMedia.description: Whether to extract media URLs (images, videos) from posts (Feature not fully implemented yet).
